RumorFact.Text: I learned a strange phrase from a Nomai scroll on Lost Strings.
I found some strange words in the Lost Village.
I found a strange recorder on Dried Tears.
I learned some wisdom from a Hearthian named Strum on Bracket's Rest.

ExploreFact.Text: I met someone at the Lost Village that looks like Riebeck named Tuner.
Tuner would like some help looking for the lyrics to his song. He needs two verses with two lines apiece. I should be able to find inspiration from the galaxy itself.
I helped Tuner find lyrics for his song. I should return to Fret and update him on my findings.

RumorFact.Text: Rim mentioned that the ice at the Ice Spire matches the ice at the Lost Village.

ExploreFact.Text: Two children played a board game centered around the search for the Eye of the Universe.
One of the residents of the village is suspected of kidnapping. Also, it seems to be getting colder.
Two villagers talked about plans to evacuate. One decided to stay behind.
"Our broken people I seek to amend."
I met Rim at the Ice Spire, and she was very much alive. She is struggling to remember her childhood for some reason.
Rim has been studying the ice. It is of the same consistency as the ice found at the Lost Village.

RumorFact.Text: Strum invited me to visit what's left of his house near the south pole of Green Base.

ExploreFact.Text: Strum also wants to learn more about this solar system. While researching the Nomai Wall on Lost Strings, he discovered that there are three scrolls across the solar system that are tied to it.
Strum isn't telling anyone about his research because he is scared of being mocked.
I found a friendly anglerfish skeleton named Ernesto. He told me that some of his friends can be found on Dried Tears.

RumorFact.Text: Strum mentioned there is a scroll somewhere on Green Base.

ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai research team found a banjo that was undamaged by the elements of the frozen planet.
Reson and Fret argued about what they should do with the banjo.
